gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Heat 118, Bulls 116
gameRecap.excerpt: Jimmy Butler made a game-winning jumper as time expired in regulation as the Heat defeat the Bulls, 118-116. Butler led Miami with 28 points and four rebounds as Kevin Love (season-high 22 PTS, season-high six 3PT, seven rebounds) and Jaime Jaquez Jr. (18 points, five rebounds, four assists) totaled 40 points. The Bulls were led by DeMar DeRozan (27 points, five assists), Patrick Williams (season-high 25 points, seven rebounds), and Coby White, who scored 18 of his 22 points in the 4th quarter. The Heat move to 15-11 as the Bulls move to 10-17.
